      • updatePersonsAssignment

        @Transactional
public void updatePersonsAssignment(Person person,
                                         Pack pack,
                                         java.util.List<Subpack> subpacks)
                             throws DaoException
        Description copied from interface: SubpackManager
        Update assigment of person. All given subpacks has to be from given pack. Exception is thrown otherwise. Manipulate only with assigments in given pack.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        person - person to be updated
        subpacks - to be assigned to person
        Throws:
        DaoException
